advancements.charmony-tweaks.extracted_e: Use a book with an enchanted item on a grindstone to extract the item's enchantments
advancements.charmony-tweaks.ground_anim: Use horse or wolf armor on a grindstone to return leather, scute, gold, iron or diamond
advancements.charmony-tweaks.healed_near: Receive a small health boost by resting near a campfire
advancements.charmony-tweaks.hidden_item: Use an amethyst shard to hide an item frame
advancements.charmony-tweaks.dropped_cob: Get a Cave Spider to drop a cobweb
advancements.charmony-tweaks.dropped_pot: Get a Witch to drop a Potion of Luck
advancements.charmony-tweaks.dropped_san: Get a Husk to drop sand
advancements.charmony-tweaks.prevented_a: Prevent direct player damage to a tamed animal
advancements.charmony-tweaks.prevented_c: Prevent farmland damage while wearing boots enchanted with Feather Falling
advancements.charmony-tweaks.repaired_ne: Use netherite scrap to repair a netherite item
advancements.charmony-tweaks.repaired_tr: Use prismarine shards to repair a Trident
advancements.charmony-tweaks.replanted_c: Use a hoe to simultaneously harvest and replant a crop
advancements.charmony-tweaks.restocked_c: Restock your current item when it runs out
advancements.charmony-tweaks.revived_ani: Revive a tamed animal from its nametag using a Totem of Undying
